# https://docs.arcade.dev/ llms.txt

- [Automate with Arcade](https://docs.arcade.dev/home): AI tools for automating tasks and enhancing workflows.
- [Arcade Toolkit Integrations](https://docs.arcade.dev/toolkits): Explore various integrations for Arcade toolkits and services.
- [Arcade Quickstart Guide](https://docs.arcade.dev/home/quickstart): Quickly integrate LLMs with tools using Arcade's API.
- [Model Providers Overview](https://docs.arcade.dev/home/supported-models): Explore various model providers for Arcade Model API.
- [Contact Arcade Support](https://docs.arcade.dev/home/contact-us): Get support and connect with the Arcade community easily.
- [Auth Providers Overview](https://docs.arcade.dev/home/auth-providers): Explore various auth providers for seamless data access.
- [Close.io Productivity](https://docs.arcade.dev/toolkits/productivity/closeio): Explore Close.io for productivity and integration tools.
- [API Key Management](https://docs.arcade.dev/home/api-keys): Learn how to generate and manage your API keys.
- [Arcade Deploy Guide](https://docs.arcade.dev/home/configure/arcade-deploy): Guide to deploying workers using Arcade CLI commands.
- [OAuth 2.0 Integration](https://docs.arcade.dev/home/auth-providers/oauth2): Integrate OAuth 2.0 for user authorization in applications.
- [Arcade Registry Early Access](https://docs.arcade.dev/home/registry-early-access): Join the Arcade Registry for tool sharing and development.
- [Authorized Tool Calling](https://docs.arcade.dev/home/auth/auth-tool-calling): Arcade enables secure authorization for AI agents using OAuth.
- [Run Evaluations](https://docs.arcade.dev/home/evaluate-tools/run-evaluations): Run evaluations of language models using Arcade CLI efficiently.
- [Custom Auth Flow](https://docs.arcade.dev/home/crewai/custom-auth-flow): Learn to create a custom authentication flow for CrewAI.
- [Authorize LangChain Tools](https://docs.arcade.dev/home/langchain/auth-langchain-tools): Guide to authorize LangChain tools using Arcade API.
- [User Authorization Workflow](https://docs.arcade.dev/home/langchain/user-auth-interrupts): Create LangGraph workflows requiring user authorization for tools.
- [Custom Docker Worker Guide](https://docs.arcade.dev/home/serve-tools/docker-worker): Guide to build custom Docker worker images using Arcade.
- [404 Error Page](https://docs.arcade.dev/integrations/toolkits/development/github/github): Page not found error for GitHub integration toolkit.
- [Arcade Deploy Guide](https://docs.arcade.dev/home/serve-tools/arcade-deploy): Guide to deploying workers using Arcade Deploy tools.
- [Control Tool Choice](https://docs.arcade.dev/home/use-tools/tool-choice): Learn how to control tool calls with Arcade's LLMs.
- [Arcade Tools Integration](https://docs.arcade.dev/home/langchain/use-arcade-tools): Integrate Arcade tools into LangGraph applications effectively.
- [Deploy Arcade Worker](https://docs.arcade.dev/home/serve-tools/modal-worker): Guide to deploy a custom Arcade Worker using Modal.
- [AI Tool Calling Overview](https://docs.arcade.dev/home/use-tools/tools-overview): Explore tool calling for AI models to enhance functionality.
- [Using Arcade Tools](https://docs.arcade.dev/home/crewai/use-arcade-tools): Integrate Arcade tools into your CrewAI application effectively.
- [ToolContext Overview](https://docs.arcade.dev/home/build-tools/tool-context): Learn about ToolContext for managing user authorization.
- [Agent Authorization Simplified](https://docs.arcade.dev/home/auth/how-arcade-helps): Arcade simplifies agent authorization for secure AI actions.
- [Direct Tool Calling](https://docs.arcade.dev/home/use-tools/call-tools-directly): Learn to directly call tools with full control.
- [Formatted Tool Definitions](https://docs.arcade.dev/home/use-tools/get-tool-definitions): Retrieve formatted tool definitions for specific model providers.
- [Evaluate Tool Calling](https://docs.arcade.dev/home/evaluate-tools/why-evaluate-tools): Evaluate language models' tool-calling capabilities effectively.
- [Create a Custom Toolkit](https://docs.arcade.dev/home/build-tools/create-a-toolkit): Guide to create and publish a custom toolkit for Arcade.
- [Handle Tool Errors](https://docs.arcade.dev/home/build-tools/handle-tool-errors): Guide to effectively handle tool errors in Arcade SDK.
- [Arcade Docker Installation](https://docs.arcade.dev/home/install/docker): Learn to install and run Arcade Engine using Docker.
- [Arcade Installation Guide](https://docs.arcade.dev/home/install/overview): Explore various installation methods for Arcade software.
- [Google Search Toolkit](https://docs.arcade.dev/toolkits/search/google_search): Enable agents to perform Google searches using SerpAPI.
- [Notion Integration Toolkit](https://docs.arcade.dev/toolkits/productivity/notion): Toolkit for integrating and interacting with Notion easily.
- [Engine Configuration Templates](https://docs.arcade.dev/home/configure/templates): Configuration templates for engine setup and management.
- [Google Maps Toolkit](https://docs.arcade.dev/toolkits/search/google_maps): Get directions between locations using Google Maps toolkit.
- [Walmart Product Search](https://docs.arcade.dev/toolkits/search/walmart): Search for Walmart products and get product details easily.
- [Dropbox Toolkit](https://docs.arcade.dev/toolkits/productivity/dropbox): Interact with Dropbox files and folders using Arcade toolkit.
- [Govee Toolkit Error](https://docs.arcade.dev/toolkits/automation/govee): Page not found error for Govee automation toolkit.
- [Atlassian Auth Configuration](https://docs.arcade.dev/toolkits/productivity/jira): Configure Atlassian auth for seamless API integration.
- [Google Shopping Search](https://docs.arcade.dev/toolkits/search/google_shopping): Search for products using Google Shopping toolkit easily.
- [Arcade Engine Configuration](https://docs.arcade.dev/home/configure/engine): Comprehensive guide for configuring the Arcade Engine settings.
- [Arcade Tools Quickstart](https://docs.arcade.dev/home/custom-tools): Set up Arcade tools with Python and API key instructions.
- [OneDrive Toolkit Error](https://docs.arcade.dev/toolkits/productivity/onedrive): Page not found error for OneDrive toolkit documentation.
- [Spotify Toolkit](https://docs.arcade.dev/toolkits/entertainment/spotify): Interact with Spotify tracks using Arcade's toolkit tools.
- [Model Configuration Guide](https://docs.arcade.dev/home/configure/models): Explore model configurations for OpenAI, Anthropic, and Ollama.
- [YouTube Video Search](https://docs.arcade.dev/toolkits/search/youtube): Search and retrieve YouTube video details easily.
- [Dropbox Item Categories](https://docs.arcade.dev/toolkits/productivity/reference): Comprehensive reference for Dropbox item categories and integrations.
- [Local Arcade Installation](https://docs.arcade.dev/home/install/local): Guide to install Arcade locally for development purposes.
- [Arcade Configuration Overview](https://docs.arcade.dev/home/configure/overview): Overview of Arcade Engine configuration files and settings.
- [Arcade Obsidian Toolkit](https://docs.arcade.dev/toolkits/productivity/obsidian): Community-driven toolkit for enhancing productivity in Obsidian.
- [Google News Toolkit](https://docs.arcade.dev/toolkits/search/google_news): Search for news stories using Google News toolkit.
- [Arcade Toolkit Installation](https://docs.arcade.dev/home/install/toolkits): Guide to installing and running Arcade toolkits locally.
- [Stripe Payment Toolkit](https://docs.arcade.dev/toolkits/payments/stripe): Interact with Stripe API for payments and invoices.
- [Atlassian Auth Configuration](https://docs.arcade.dev/toolkits/productivity/confluence): Configure Atlassian auth for Arcade tools and apps.
- [Google Flights Toolkit](https://docs.arcade.dev/toolkits/search/google_flights): Search for flights easily with Arcade's Google Flights toolkit.
- [Hubspot CRM Integration](https://docs.arcade.dev/toolkits/sales/hubspot): Integrate Hubspot CRM with agents for seamless data access.
- [Call Tools with LLMs](https://docs.arcade.dev/home/use-tools/call-tools-with-models): Learn to use LLMs for tool calling with Arcade.
- [Create Evaluation Suite](https://docs.arcade.dev/home/evaluate-tools/create-an-evaluation-suite): Learn to create evaluation suites for custom tools.
- [Atlassian Auth Provider](https://docs.arcade.dev/home/auth-providers/atlassian): Guide to configuring Atlassian auth provider for Arcade.

- [GitHub Toolkit Reference](https://docs.arcade.dev/toolkits/development/github/reference): Comprehensive GitHub Toolkit reference for developers' integration.
- [Google Auth Provider](https://docs.arcade.dev/home/auth-providers/google): Integrate Google OAuth 2.0 for app authorization easily.
- [Zoom Integration Toolkit](https://docs.arcade.dev/toolkits/social-communication/zoom): Integrate Zoom for meeting info and invitations retrieval.
- [Twitch Auth Provider](https://docs.arcade.dev/home/auth-providers/twitch): Guide to configuring Twitch auth provider for Arcade.
- [Zoom Auth Provider](https://docs.arcade.dev/home/auth-providers/zoom): Guide to configuring Zoom Auth Provider for Arcade.
- [Arcade X Toolkit](https://docs.arcade.dev/toolkits/social-communication/x): Toolkit for agents to interact with X (formerly Twitter).
- [Gmail Toolkit](https://docs.arcade.dev/toolkits/productivity/google/gmail): Manage emails easily with Gmail integration tools.
- [User Authorization Guide](https://docs.arcade.dev/home/build-tools/create-a-tool-with-auth): Learn to add user authorization to custom tools using Arcade.
- [GitHub Auth Provider](https://docs.arcade.dev/home/auth-providers/github): Learn to configure GitHub auth for Arcade applications.
- [Dropbox Auth Provider](https://docs.arcade.dev/home/auth-providers/dropbox): Guide to configuring Dropbox auth provider for Arcade.
- [Google Docs Toolkit](https://docs.arcade.dev/toolkits/productivity/google/docs): Interact with Google Docs to create and manage documents.
- [Anthropic Integration](https://docs.arcade.dev/home/supported-models/anthropic): Integrate Anthropic with Arcade Engine for chat models.
- [Build FastAPI Worker](https://docs.arcade.dev/home/serve-tools/build-a-worker-with-fastapi): Learn to build a FastAPI worker for Arcade.
- [X Auth Provider](https://docs.arcade.dev/home/auth-providers/x): Integrate X (Twitter) API with Arcade for user authorization.
- [Retryable Tool Error](https://docs.arcade.dev/home/build-tools/retry-tools-with-improved-prompt): Learn to use RetryableToolError for improved tool calls.
- [Notion Auth Provider](https://docs.arcade.dev/home/auth-providers/notion): Configure Notion auth for seamless API integration with Arcade.
- [Ollama Configuration Guide](https://docs.arcade.dev/home/supported-models/ollama): Guide to connect and configure Ollama with Arcade.
- [Web Toolkit](https://docs.arcade.dev/toolkits/development/web/web): Tools for scraping, crawling, and mapping websites easily.
- [Hubspot Auth Provider](https://docs.arcade.dev/home/auth-providers/hubspot): Integrate Hubspot APIs using Arcade's auth provider setup.

- [Google Drive Toolkit](https://docs.arcade.dev/toolkits/productivity/google/drive): Interact with Google Drive using Arcade's toolkit tools.

- [Google Calendar Toolkit](https://docs.arcade.dev/toolkits/productivity/google/calendar): Integrate Google Calendar for event management and scheduling.
- [Web Toolkit Reference](https://docs.arcade.dev/toolkits/development/web/reference): Comprehensive reference for web toolkit formats and usage.

- [Google Contacts Toolkit](https://docs.arcade.dev/toolkits/productivity/google/contacts): Easily manage Google Contacts with powerful toolkit features.

- [Discord Auth Configuration](https://docs.arcade.dev/toolkits/social-communication/discord): Guide to configure Discord auth for Arcade tools.

- [Google Toolkit Reference](https://docs.arcade.dev/toolkits/productivity/google/reference): Comprehensive reference for Google Toolkit features and options.
